answers.answer: Hi,A twitch sometimes develops during times of increased stress. Twitching has also been associated with high caffeine intake or  fatigue . Medical conditions like neurodegenerative diseases , muscular dystrophy or Myopathy may also be the cause .Please consult a physician or neurologist for the complete investigations  regarding muscle tone and nerve conduction . Hope this helps you  . Take care and regards !

question: week ago started having left eye and face twitching. it lasts for seconds but is very unconfortable. i am 73 anddo have diabetes 2 . any advice. thanks
title: eye and face twitching
